title: Something wrong with my store
body: Hey guys! I just want to know why i cant Purchase RP in the store...it says ' An Internal Error has Occur' I have tried to download it again..but it doesnt work. I really need someone to help...XD

replies.body:
Hey there,

Please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support as they're the only ones who can assist you with account related issues.
